titles.title: School Athletic Facilities Restoration Act of 2011
To authorize the Secretary of Education to make grants to local educational agencies for the construction, renovation, or repair of athletics facilities.
School Athletic Facilities Restoration Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

bill.summary: School Athletic Facilities Restoration Act of 2011 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Education to award competitive matching grants to local educational agencies for the construction, renovation, or repair of school athletic facilities.
